itemDesc: A 30mm cannon shell used by light vehicle-mounted weapons for anti-infantry and light vehicle engagements.
A 40mm high-explosive shell commonly used by field cannons and vehicle-mounted turrets. Effective against infantry, vehicles, and structures.
A 68mm armor-piercing shell designed for anti-tank field guns and heavy vehicle cannons.
A powerful 75mm shell used by heavy vehicle cannons, capable of dealing significant damage to armored targets and fortified positions.
A high-caliber 94.5mm shell designed for heavy armor engagements and destruction of reinforced structures.
A specialized anti-aircraft shell designed to engage fast-moving aerial targets using high-explosive fragmentation.
